name: Eraviputhoorkadai Jumma Masjid
description: Eraviputhoorkadai Jumma Masjid, situated in Kanyakumari district, is a revered Islamic center known for its pivotal role in community gatherings and religious activities. It serves as a place of worship and cultural exchange, fostering unity and spiritual growth among worshippers through Quranic studies, educational programs, and social initiatives. The masjid stands as a symbol of Islamic heritage and communal harmony, catering to the spiritual needs of the local Muslim community.
location: Eraviputhoorkadai Junction, NH 66, Veeyanoor, Tamil Nadu 629158
